__comment__: This file was automatically created by mcresources
name: Crankshafts

pages.text: A $(thing)Crankshaft$() is a way of turning $(l:mechanics/mechanical_power)Rotational Power$() into $(thing)Moving-back-and-forth Power$(). This can be useful in order to power devices such as the $(l:mechanics/bellows)Bellows$(), or $(l:mechanics/pumps)Water Pumps$().$(br2)The $(thing)Crankshaft$() consists of two parts: the base, and the shaft.
The base can be crafted from $(thing)Brass$(),
Once a base is placed, a shaft can be added to it by using a $(thing)Steel Rod$() on the base. If there is an empty space to the side of the crankshaft, the rod will be placed.
